attributes.action: End taxing the use of waste vegetable oil as fuel to encourage more environmental motoring in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long those who wish to use cheap, clean and otherwise almost useless wate vegetable oil as fuel have been taxed on its use.  Please bare in mind that the sale of this oil was already taxed, why should we pay twice?

Removing this insane tax would create an incentive for clean green motoring and excite interest in important new business interests, processing bio fuels from waste muck (a bi product of this process is the collection of glycerin for soap!

Lets face it this tax is almost impossible to police and frequently flaunted, this is a win win proposition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
